about_the_game:
You, a brilliant but unorthodox scholar, stands on the precipice of a groundbreaking discovery. Your lifelong pursuit of the paranormal takes an electrifying turn when a spectral mansion arises from the depths of a deep marsh near his university. As you prepare to delve into its mysteries, you're met with an unexpected obstacle: a group of pious college girls and their stern Mother Superior, intent on transforming the mansion into a haven of religious retreat.

Your first night in the mansion leads to an encounter that shatters your understanding of reality. Judy, a seductive and enigmatic ghost girl, awakens you with an audacious proposition: continue your bloodline, and she will unveil the secrets of the mystical realm. Bound by an insatiable thirst for knowledge, you agree to this unholy pact. Your mission: to impregnate the young women Judy lures to the mansion.

What begins as a calculated pursuit of forbidden pleasure soon transforms into something far more complex as you find yourself unexpectedly captivated by the women you encounter.

Minerva, the Mother Superior, is a woman whose stern facade masks a past shrouded in regret. Can you unravel her secrets and discover the vulnerabilities beneath her pious exterior?

Cindy, the domineering alpha girl, will challenge you at every turn. Will you be able to penetrate her defenses and reveal the softer heart within?

Sienna, once silenced by a physical disability, now possesses a newfound voice and an insatiable curiosity about the pleasures of the flesh. Will you become her guide in this exploration of sensual awakening?

And Gemma, a playful spirit with a penchant for risqué lingerie and a troubled past. Can you heal the wounds that haunt her and restore her faith in love?

As you navigates this treacherous path, you'll uncover hidden power behind Judy's ghostly abilities. And amidst the seductive allure of the mansion, you must confront your own desires and make a choice that will determine not only your fate, but the destiny of these captivating women.

The Judas Ghost is a tale of forbidden desires, unexpected connections, and the pursuit of knowledge at any cost. It's a story that will challenge your perceptions, ignite your passions, and leave you questioning the boundaries between the natural and the supernatural.



Unleash the Secrets of The Judas Ghost

In this thrilling visual novel, you'll:

Explore a Haunted Mansion: Navigate the mansion's eerie halls, collecting curious objects and unraveling its mysteries. Your trusty inventory system will keep your treasures organized.

Spoil Your Gals: Use your hard-earned currency to purchase stylish outfits and useful items for the young ladies. Who knows, a little pampering might unlock hidden secrets...

Choose Your Path: The mansion's secrets won't reveal themselves easily. Follow the arrows or consult your map to explore its depths, and make crucial choices that shape your adventure.

Keep Your Story Straight: An organized journal will guide your journey, ensuring you don't miss a beat. Each girl's story is packed full of sexy scenes.

Relive Your Favorite Moments: The gallery is your personal treasure trove. Sort scenes by flavor, girl, or both and replay them to your heart's content.

Take Control of Your Fate: In The Judas Ghost, you're the master of your destiny. Choose which girl to focus on, what secrets to uncover, and how your story unfolds.

Are you ready to step into the world of The Judas Ghost? The mansion's doors are creaking open, inviting you to embark on a thrilling adventure where your choices matter.
